$LTB_{i,t} = \frac{1}{(T-t)} \sum_{k=1}^{T-t} \frac{B_{i,t}^{t+k} - f_{t+k}}{f_{t+k}}$




$LTB_{i,t} = C_{i} + \beta_1Periodtrend + \beta_2Markettrend + \beta_3Neutrality_{i,t-1} + \beta_4Happiness_{i,t-1} + \beta_5Sadness_{i,t-1} + \beta_6Anger_{i,t-1} + \beta_7Surprise_{i,t-1} + \beta_8Fear_{i,t-1} + \beta_9Disgust_{i,t-1}$

$LTB_{i,t} = C_{i} + \beta_1Neutrality_{i,t-1} + \beta_2Happiness_{i,t-1} + \beta_3Sadness_{i,t-1} + \beta_4Anger_{i,t-1} + \beta_5Surprise_{i,t-1} + \beta_6Fear_{i,t-1} + \beta_7Disgust_{i,t-1}$

(Fixed effects regression model)
(Periods 2-14 only)

```{r, echo= FALSE, message=FALSE,warning = FALSE}
library(plm)
library(tidyverse)
library(jtools)
library(huxtable)
my_main_data <- read.csv(file="C:/Users/Liran/Google Drive/Study/PhD/Face_Reader/The_Experiment/Regressions/long_term_belief_using_record_stage_emotions_of_t-1/S1_S6_transpose_with_t-1_record_stage_emotions_long_term.csv", header=TRUE, sep=",")
 
```

# HL

## Low HL (risk averse)

```{r, echo= FALSE, message=FALSE,warning = FALSE}
library(plm)
library(tidyverse)
library(jtools)
library(huxtable)
mydata <- subset(my_main_data, HL<=4)
 
```

### Long term - All Emotions {.tabset}

#### All subjects

```{r, echo= FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

market1 = subset(mydata, period<=15)
market2 = subset(mydata, period>15)
#Fix effect market 1
Fixed_effects1 = plm(ltb ~ p_trend + neutral + happy + sad + angry + surprised + scared + disgusted, data=market1, index = c("id","t_k") , model="within")
#Fix effect market 2
Fixed_effects2 = plm(ltb ~ p_trend + m_trend + neutral + happy + sad + angry + surprised + scared + disgusted, data=market2, index = c("id","t_k") , model="within")

export_summs(Fixed_effects1, Fixed_effects2,scale = TRUE,
             model.names = c("Market1", "Market2"),statistics = c(N = "nobs", R2 = "r.squared") , coefs =  c("Periodtrend" = "p_trend","Markettrend" = "m_trend", "Neutrality" = "neutral" , "Happiness" = "happy", "Sadness" = "sad", "Anger" = "angry","Surprise" = "surprised", "Fear" = "scared", "Disgust" = "disgusted" ),error_format = "({p.value})", stars = c(`***` = 0.01, `**` = 0.05, `*` = 0.1))

#Fix effect market 1
Fixed_effects1 = plm(ltb ~ neutral + happy + sad + angry + surprised + scared + disgusted, data=market1, index = c("id","t_k") , model="within")
#Fix effect market 2
Fixed_effects2 = plm(ltb ~ neutral + happy + sad + angry + surprised + scared + disgusted, data=market2, index = c("id","t_k") , model="within")

export_summs(Fixed_effects1, Fixed_effects2,scale = TRUE,
             model.names = c("Market1", "Market2"),statistics = c(N = "nobs", R2 = "r.squared") , coefs =  c("Neutrality" = "neutral" , "Happiness" = "happy", "Sadness" = "sad", "Anger" = "angry","Surprise" = "surprised", "Fear" = "scared", "Disgust" = "disgusted" ),error_format = "({p.value})", stars = c(`***` = 0.01, `**` = 0.05, `*` = 0.1))

```
